/** * Navbar Component * Main navigation menu with category dropdown */ import React, { useState, useRef, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link, NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Navbar.css'; const Navbar = () => { const [isNavOpen, setIsNavOpen] = useState(false); const [isCategoryOpen, setIsCategoryOpen] = useState(false); const categories = [ { name: 'Smart Phones', count: 3 }, { name: 'Mobile Accessories', count: 6 }, { name: 'Tablets & E-readers', count: 4 }, { name: 'Laptops', count: 4 }, { name: 'Mouse & Keyboards', count: 4 }, { name: 'Gaming Consoles', count: 4 }, { name: 'Smart Watches & Wearables', count: 4 }, { name: 'Smart Home Devices', count: 4 }, { name: 'Toys & Gadgets', count: 4 }, { name: 'Bluetooth Speakers', count: 4 } ]; const navRef = useRef(null); useEffect(() => { const handleClickOutside = (e) => { if (isCategoryOpen && navRef.current && !navRef.current.contains(e.target)) { setIsCategoryOpen(false); } }; document.addEventListener('mousedown', handleClickOutside); return () => document.removeEventListener('mousedown', handleClickOutside); }, [isCategoryOpen]); return (
{/* Categories Sidebar */}
    {categories.map((category, index) => (
  • {category.name} ({category.count})
    • ))}
{/* Main Navigation */}
{/* Mobile Logo */}

Electro

  • {category.name} ({category.count})
    • ))}
{/* Call Button */} +0123 456 7890
); }; export default Navbar;
